message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we understand its true worth to you exceeds $1000000. We propose an offer of $1200000 for the product, aiming to strike a fair balance between our expectations and your valuation. Please let us know if this proposal meets your considerations or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1200000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Given the value I place on the product, I'm willing to offer $1050000.  I believe this price is fair, reflecting both our respective valuations.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to meet our expectations. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer to better align with your valuation. We are now proposing a price of $1100000 for the product. We hope this proposal will facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.
